definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: This article deals with automatic entry method of microcomputer business accounting system.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳細介紹了微機商業會計自動化分錄登帳方法。

sentences.english: Notice that this entry is exactly the opposite of the entry as uncollectible.
sentences.chinese: 注意這個會計分錄恰好與覈銷壞賬的分錄相反。

sentences.english: Notice that this entry is exactly the opposite of the entry as uncollectible.
sentences.chinese: 注意這個會計分錄恰好與覈銷壞賬的分錄相反。

sentences.english: The cost of merchandise sold is subtracted from sales to arrive at gross profit.
sentences.chinese: 在銷貨業務發生時，對於已出售的商品成本不作分錄。

sentences.english: Such unrecorded revenue is recorded by making an adjusting entry at the end of the period.
sentences.chinese: 此類未記錄的收入在會計期末要作調整分錄加以記錄。

sentences.english: The journal is sometimes called the book of original entry.
sentences.chinese: 日記賬有時也叫原始分錄賬。

sentences.english: When the money is paid, the system will automatically generate corresponding accounting entries.
sentences.chinese: 在付款的同時，系統會自動生成相應的會計分錄。

sentences.english: The debit portion of the entry allocates this expired COST to expense.
sentences.chinese: 分錄的借記方將已使用了的成本部分分配到費用賬戶。

sentences.english: Journal entries show all sides of the transaction in one place.
sentences.chinese: 日記賬分錄可在同一個地方列示業務的所有方面。

sentences.english: At the same time of making payment, the system will automatically generate corresponding accounting entry.
sentences.chinese: 在付款的同時，系統會自動生成相應的會計分錄。

sentences.english: In a compound entry, all the credits are listed under the debits.
sentences.chinese: 在複合分錄中，所有貸方應列在借方之下。

sentences.english: Making end-of-period adjusting entries, journalizing and posting them in ledger accounts.
sentences.chinese: 作期末調整分錄，記入日記賬並過入分類賬。

sentences.english: Responsible for the accuracy of all journal entries and updating credit department on account status.
sentences.chinese: 負責所有分錄的準確性，更新信用部門的賬戶狀況。

sentences.english: For return of goods sold or refund of tax, accounting entries to the contrary shall be made.
sentences.chinese: 發生銷貨退回及退稅時作相反的會計分錄。
生產成本覈算，分錄編制。

sentences.english: This menu allows to seek only for the entries relating to employees services.
sentences.chinese: 這個菜單允許尋找唯一關於員工服務分錄。
